question: The bear who spends all of his money on nice things. But he doesn’t save, invest, or give.
The bear who saves every dollar she earns. But she doesn’t invest or give.
The bear who invests every dollar he can find. But he doesn’t save or give.
The bear who gives all of her money away to everyone she knows. But she doesn’t buy nice things for herself and she doesn’t save or invest for the future.
